Technique: ENGOBE; FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; PAINTED
Name: Amphora
Description: Narrow-mouthed amphora, the neck of which is also narrow and moulded, and with a stable base with a convex bottom and ring-shaped foot. Orangey-coloured paste and exterior surface with whitish-coloured coating. It has a painted decoration consisting of a band, framed by horizontal lines, on the inside of which are linear zigzag motifs in black.
